https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ikb6cZI8RXUqcxApMJmIdimAJ1X.jpg In a Mars base, the inhabitants are being infected by a mysterious water creature which takes over its victims. The Doctor is thrust into the middle of this catastrophe, knowing a larger one is waiting around the corner. Doctor Who: The Waters of Mars
